text.div:
Contract Term Subtype Codes

This value set includes sample Contract Term SubType codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/contracttermsubtypecodes defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
condition ConditionTerms that go to the very root of a contract.
warranty WarrantyLess imperative than a condition, so the contract will survive a breach
innominate InnominateBreach of which may or may not go to the root of the contract depending upon the nature of the breach

name: Contract Term Subtype Codes
description: This value set includes sample Contract Term SubType codes.

concept.definition: Terms that go to the very root of a contract.
Less imperative than a condition, so the contract will survive a breach
Breach of which may or may not go to the root of the contract depending upon the nature of the breach
